name: [GD] AWS CloudWatch Log Stream Deletion
description: Identifies the deletion of an AWS CloudWatch log stream, which permanently deletes all associated archived log events with the stream.
note: The AWS Filebeat module must be enabled to use this rule.
author: Elastic
false_positives: A log stream may be deleted by a system administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Log stream deletions from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
query: event.action:DeleteLogStream and event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:logs.amazonaws.com and event.outcome:success
